name: Forest Escape (itch) (p h y z o i d)
name_original: Forest Escape (itch) (p h y z o i d)
description:
Goal:
The escape tree beckons to you, but he can only do so for so long -- find him quickly and escape the forest.

- Boot the game up multiple times to see what happens!
- Game Quits when you win.
- I promise you your antivirus is lying -- this game is not a trojan
- Play with the most grass your computer will allow!
- Forest Escape 2.0 is quite different, and I would recommend that one.
- In my experience, works nearly flawlessly on Linux with Proton Experimental, except for slight audio clipping.

Controls:
- Decent audio required, headphones preferable
- WASD/Mouse (FPS controls)
- F11 for fullscreen
- ESC for Exit
developers: p h y z o i d
